front.title: Algorithms for computing Maximally Redundant Trees for IP/LDP Fast- Reroute

abstract.t: A complete solution for IP and LDP Fast-Reroute using Maximally Redundant Trees is presented in [I-D.ietf-rtgwg-mrt-frr- architecture]. This document describes an algorithm that can be used to compute the necessary Maximally Redundant Trees and the associated next-hops.
